welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Braine-le-Chateau, a charming city known for its picturesque streets and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth during peak hours.
